languages.text: {n}Октавиана задирает брови.{/n} "Позвольте, вы сами попросили местного пойла. Лучшая бражка, какую можно достать у техносброда с нижних астероидов — свое производство, высокое октановое число... на Футфоле нет ни теплиц, ни фруктовых рощ, {mf|господин|госпожа} — местные довольствуются тем, что есть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Октавиана задирает брови.{/n} "Позвольте, вы сами попросили местного пойла. Лучшая бражка, какую можно достать у техносброда с нижних астероидов — свое производство, высокое октановое число... на Футфоле нет ни теплиц, ни фруктовых рощ, {mf|господин|госпожа} — местные довольствуются тем, что есть".

languages.text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."
languages.original_text: {n}Октавиана задирает брови.{/n} "Позвольте, вы сами попросили местного пойла. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

languages.text: {n}奥克塔维娜扬起了眉毛。{/n}“请原谅，但这是当地的烈酒，是你自己点的。这已经是从那些小行星上的技术无赖那里能弄到的最好的自酿酒了，本地特产，富含辛烷……落脚港没有温室，也没有果园，{mf|先生|女士|}。所以，这里的人只能有什么东西，就拿什么东西对付。”
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥克塔维娜扬起了眉毛。{/n}“请原谅，但这是当地的烈酒，是你自己点的。这已经是从那些小行星上的技术无赖那里能弄到的最好的自酿酒了，本地特产，富含辛烷……落脚港没有温室，也没有果园，{mf|先生|女士|。所以，这里的人只能有什么东西，就拿什么东西对付。”

languages.text: {n}Octaviana alza las cejas.{/n} «Lo siento, pero fuiste tú {mf|el|la} que me pidió que le sirviera licor de la zona. Es el mejor que puedes conseguir de la escoria tecnológica de los asteroides bajos: está producido aquí, tiene una gran cantidad de octano... En Paso no hay invernaderos ni vergeles frutales, {mf|señor|señora}. Aquí la gente sobrevive con lo que tiene».
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana alza las cejas.{/n} «Lo siento, pero fuiste tú {mf|el|la} que me pidió que le sirviera licor de la zona. Es el mejor que puedes conseguir de la escoria tecnológica de los asteroides bajos: está producido aquí, tiene una gran cantidad de octano... En Paso no hay invernaderos ni vergeles frutales, {mf|señor|señora}. Aquí la gente sobrevive con lo que tiene».

languages.text: {n}オクタヴィアナが眉を上げた。{/n}「やれやれ、おすすめの地酒が欲しいって言ったのはあんただろ？こいつは下層小惑星の技術者たちから手に入る最高の手作りの酒…地元産の超強力な1杯だよ。フットフォールには温室も果樹園もないからね、{mf|旦那|姐さん}―あるものを工夫するしかないのさ」
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}オクタヴィアナが眉を上げた。{/n}「やれやれ、おすすめの地酒が欲しいって言ったのはあんただろ？こいつは下層小惑星の技術者たちから手に入る最高の手作りの酒…地元産の超強力な1杯だよ。フットフォールには温室も果樹園もないからね、{mf|旦那|姐さん}―あるものを工夫するしかないのさ」

languages.text: {n}Octaviana zieht ihre Augenbrauen hoch.{/n} "Moment mal, Ihr habt doch nach dem hiesigen Fusel gefragt. Das ist der beste Selbstgebrannte, den Ihr bei dem Tech-Gesindel auf den unteren Asteroiden bekommt – aus lokaler Produktion, mit hoher Oktanzahl ... Footfall hat keine Gewächshäuser oder Obstgärten, {mf|Sir|Madam} – die Leute kommen mit dem zurecht, was sie haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana zieht ihre Augenbrauen hoch.{/n} "Moment mal, Ihr habt doch nach dem hiesigen Fusel gefragt. Das ist der beste Selbstgebrannte, den Ihr bei dem Tech-Gesindel auf den unteren Asteroiden bekommt – aus lokaler Produktion, mit hoher Oktanzahl ... Footfall hat keine Gewächshäuser oder Obstgärten, {mf|Sir|Madam} – die Leute kommen mit dem zurecht, was sie haben."

languages.text: {n}Octaviana hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Excusez-moi, mais c'est vous qui avez voulu la gnôle locale. Vous trouverez pas meilleure décoction maison parmi toute la racaille des astéroïdes inférieurs : production locale, indice d'octane élevé... Castel n'a ni serres ni vergers, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Ici, on se débrouille avec ce qu'on trouve. »
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Excusez-moi, mais c'est vous qui avez voulu la gnôle locale. Vous trouverez pas meilleure décoction maison parmi toute la racaille des astéroïdes inférieurs : production locale, indice d'octane élevé... Castel n'a ni serres ni vergers, {mf|m'sire|ma'ame}. Ici, on se débrouille avec ce qu'on trouve. »

languages.text: {n}Octaviana, kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Kusura bakmayın da buraların ünlü içkisini isteyen sizdiniz. Aşağı asteroitlerdeki tekno güruhundan alabileceğiniz en iyi ev yapımı içki budur. Buralarda böyle yüksek oktanlı içkiler üretilir. {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi}, Binliman'da ne sera var ne de meyve bahçesi. Burada insanlar ellerine ne geçerse onunla yetinir."
languages.original_text: {n}Octaviana raises her brows.{/n} "Pardon me, but you were the one who asked for the local hooch. It's the best home brew you can get from the tech riffraff on the lower asteroids — locally produced, high octane number... Footfall's got no greenhouses or fruit orchards, {mf|sir|ma'am} — the people here get by with what they have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Octaviana, kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Kusura bakmayın da, buraların ünlü içkisini isteyen siz değil miydiniz? Aşağı asteroitlerdeki tekno güruhundan satın alabileceğiniz en iyi ev yapımı içki budur. Buralarda böyle yüksek oktanlı içkiler üretilir... {mf|Beyfendi|Hanfendi}, Binliman'da ne sera var ne de meyve bahçesi... Burada insanlar ellerine ne geçerse onunla yetinir."
